name: Hudhud
0:
”"Alexa, What's the temperature in the office?"”
”"Alexa, turn on the garden light"”
”"Alexa, is the pump on?"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Hudhud Skill integrates Alexa with Hudhud System and allows you to control different types of Hudhud devices/switches/plugs with your voice using Alexa, also allows you to query Alexa for the current Temperature from your Hudhud temperature sensors.
All Temperature sensors and controllable bi-states devices are supported, more device types/modes might get supported in the future.
To get started, assuming you have a Hudhud account with working bi-state devices, press "Enable Skill", after enabling the skill you will be redirected to the Hudhud website from where you have to log in to your Hudhud account.
Then Alexa will scan for all new Huhdhud devices.

Note: device names will be the same as defined in the Hudhud system.

Supported Commands are:
"Alexa, What's the temperature in the office?"
"Alexa, turn on the garden light"
"Alexa, is the pump on?"
"Alexa, turn off the pump"
